mapper.select: select c.* from user_info a left join map_user_role b on a.id = b.user_id left join role_info c on b.role_id = c.id where c.status = 1 and a.user_name = #{userName}

select count(*) from role_info a where a.status = 1
and a.name like concat('%',#{entity.name},'%')
and a.description like concat('%',#{entity.description},'%')
order by a.sort

select a.*, GROUP_CONCAT(c.id) resource_ids, GROUP_CONCAT(c.name) resource_name, d.user_name from role_info a left join map_role_resource b on a.id = b.role_id left join resource_info c on b.resource_id = c.id left join user_info d on a.create_user = d.id where a.status = 1
and a.name like concat('%',#{entity.name},'%')
and a.description like concat('%',#{entity.description},'%')
group by a.id order by a.sort limit #{entity.page}, #{entity.limit}
select distinct c.id role_id, c.`name` role_name, c.description from user_info a left join map_user_role b on a.id = b.user_id left join role_info c on b.role_id = c.id where a.id = #{userId}
